creator: Ziff-Davis Publishing Company
description: Amazing Science Fiction Stories, Volume 32 Number 8, August of 1958. Published by Ziff-Davis Publishing Company, One Park Avenue, New York 16, New York. Dimensions are 5 1/2" width by 7 1/2" Height and 107grams, 150 pages. Copyright was issued in 1958, but no renewal was recorded, this work is Public Domain under Rule 6 of the Copyright Statutes of the United States. The following pages were torn out of the magazine: 35-36, 53-54, 59-60 and 143-144. If in the future they can be found, they will be added. Etext created by Gerard Arthus.
